desc: One stop shop for all POS (Point of Sale) needs including POS systems, Clover, POS peripherals & supplies, thermal and bond papers for POS terminals, cash registers, ATM, gas pumps, ribbons, thermal labels, credit card machines, pinpads, and EMV swipers/readers, and the list goes on.

layout.text: Available in every size, for every brand and model, and every type of printer.
